lines.text: Duke here, he don't bite. He's just a little pecker.

[to Poke]
I don't wanna see the sun rise on your ass boy!
Duke here's a chicken that thinks he's a rooster.

[to Duke]
You wouldn't bullshit ol C.J. now would ya?

[after Buford invites Poke to shoot his truck]
I never shot a truck before!

[Realizing that Poke took the money]
Lenny, pick up Poke Jackson.
What's the charge?
Same damn thing... Possession.

[Sheriff Duke drives his car into a building, and Lenny is thrown out]
Lenny, you alright?
Yeah.
Shut the door.

[to C.J. Crane]
Get your ass out of my chair.

[Buford falls out of his truck]
You son of a bitch!... That's the last time you're gonna throw me!
[Buford shoots his truck]

[after shooting Buford's truck]
That was alright, Buford... I like shootin' trucks!
Stick with me, cowboy, and we'll shoot up half the county.
Lenny, I want you to put out an all points bulletin on Poke Jackson... Armed and dangerous.
But Duke, he didn't take our weapons.
Lenny, are you hard of hearing?... I said armed and dangerous.

[to C.J. Crane]
I'm gonna get Poke Jackson in my own way.

[to C.J. Crane]
If I go down, I'm taking ya with me!

[to Sheriff Duke]
I always kept my fences mended, and my tracks covered.

[Poke has just arrived in town]
I'm the sheriff now.
How'd ya pull that one off, Duke?
Duly elected by the people.

[Duke is beating up Boogie]
Boy, you know I hate losing my temper... Cause when I do, I get indigestion... And that makes me angry!

[Lenny has been looking at himself in the mirror]
Boy, one of these days, that guy in the mirror is gonna shoot your balls off... If you don't get him first.

[Poke is talking about his time in prison]
I'll bet you were hornier than a three-balled tomcat!

[Talking to Uncle Bull]
We need a car, Mister.
I don't have me no car... I do have one hell of a truck, though.

[Buford looks at Poke]
You just get outta the state pen?
How'd ya know that?
I recognize your tailor.

[after gets the money off Poke]
Ya know somethin' Poke?... Ya always did have a big mouth!... Ya know somethin' else?... I always did wanna shut it for ya!... Ya almost killed the kid and Mary Lee, and ya killed a deputy!... That's murder, boy!

[Uncle Bull has a shotgun pointed at Poke]
Tell you what... Walk around out in the open so's I can see ya... Mind ya now, you so much as move so's your scratchin' yourself, I'll open a hole in ya that you can walk through.

[Duke has just caught Poke and Mary Lee]
Hey Lenny, that's another thing we're gonna hafta charge this old boy with... Kidnapping.
He didn't kidnap us, we went with him.
Yeah, that was smart... You could'a got youself and the kid killed.

[Lenny is looking at himself in a mirror, and he draws his gun]
Say your prayers, you son of a bitch!
